pages.text: Pyramids are pyramid-shaped (surprise!) buildings with two towers at the side that harbour a total of four $(l:blocks/chest)chests$(). They consist mostly of different types of $(l:blocks/sand)sandstone$() (in $(l:biomes/desert)deserts$()) or red sandstone (in $(l:biomes/mesa)mesas$()).$(br2)A pattern of $(l:blocks/terracotta)dyed terracotta$() marks where the treasure is. But beware, there is a $(l:redstone/tnt)TNT$() trap guarding it...
There have also been unconfirmed rumors of snowy and icy pyramids that use entirely different traps.
